sn14.14:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:1.3: Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
sn14.14:1.4: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
sn14.14:2.1: In the past, too, sentient beings came together and converged because of an element. …
sn14.14:3.1: In the future, too, sentient beings will come together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.14:4.1: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
sn14.14:4.2: Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
sn14.14:4.3: Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
